name: Agent 3310
description:
This game has been made for Ludum Dare 36, following the theme "Ancient Technology".

You find an old Nokia 3310 in the street and start receiving strange messages asking you to "hack the phone".

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

Use the mouse to interact with the phone.

The controls varies depending of the app, you'll have to use 2,4,6,8 to move the snake, the arrows to read a message...

PLEASE ACTIVATE SOUNDS TO PLAY THIS GAME
